dialogues.name: ClassmateC
dialogues.content: Vincent, you're studying in the library again. You always seem so diligent in your studies.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Yes, the study room is very quiet. I usually choose to complete the homework assigned by the teacher there, and then do some additional exercises after class.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: No, it's just that I think I left my pencil case in the library yesterday, so I came to check.
